madhyastha atharamadiyeku lesin jathyanthara rathu kurusa kamituwa gatum parshawayan samaga gatume windithayan aarakshakirima ha owunata upakara labadimata katayuthu kara athi bawa niwedanayak nikuth karamin ema kamituwa sandahan karayi. 1989 wasaredi athiwu aarakshaka thathwaya hamuwe palamuwa anuradhapura karyalaye sita rathu kurusa aayathanaya wawuniya pa්radeshaye katayuthu aarambha kara thibe. 1997 di rathu kurusa aayathanaya wawuniya nagaraye thama karyalaya sthawara washayenma pihituwa gena athi athara wasarin wasara gewunu kalayath samagin aayathanaya siya katayuthu ee awatin wu mulathiwu, kilinochch ha mannarama yana distha්rikkawalatada wyaptha karanu labiya.
